title: Interesting blinding flash on Graves AA in ARAM
body:
I dont know title speaks for its self


file:///C:/Riot%20Games/League%20of%20Legends/Screenshots/Screen08.png



(new to boards idk if im doing it right)

replies.body:
Hey Jreyes456,

Thanks for the report! This affects all maps, and affects Classic Graves as well as his skins. We're working on a fix!
The file didn't show up, but yeah, it's a known issue. It's why Phantom Dancer was disabled, and I guess they just didn't finish it completely.
